Name: NATO COMMAND DESIGNATOR
Explanation: AS DEFINED BY MC 324 (FINAL) DATED 6 JANUARY 1999.

Name: MISSION COMMANDER DESIGNATOR
Explanation: THE CODE FOR THE COMMANDER RESPONSIBLE FOR MANAGING AND HARMONIZING THE EFFORTS OF TEMPORARILY ASSIGNED FORCES TO EXECUTE A SINGLE MISSION.

Name: REQUESTING TASKING AUTHORITY DESIGNATOR
Explanation: AS DEFINED BY MC 324 (FINAL) DATED 6 JANUARY 1999.

Name: AIRSPACE CONTROL MEANS IDENTIFYING DESIGNATOR
Explanation: THE DESIGNATOR ASSIGNED TO THE AIRSPACE CONTROL APPLIED TO A DEFINED AIRSPACE.

Name: RUNWAY DIRECTION DESIGNATOR
Explanation: THE DESIGNATION OF THE RUNWAY ORIENTATION.

Name: REACTION FORCE DESIGNATOR
Explanation: AS DEFINED BY MC 324 (FINAL) DATED 6 JANUARY 1999.

Name: DATA LINK EMISSION DESIGNATOR
Explanation: A STANDARD EMISSION DESIGNATOR CODE USED IN DATA LINK OPERATIONS.

Name: LANDING ZONE DESIGNATOR
Explanation: A DESIGNATOR, NAME OR IDENTIFIER ASSIGNED TO A LANDING ZONE OR OTHER ZONE OF OPERATIONS.

Name: AREA DESIGNATOR
Explanation: PROVIDES THE DESIGNATOR FOR SPECIFIC AREA.

Name: CONTACT DESIGNATOR
Explanation: A CODE USED TO DESIGNATE A CONTACT.

Name: TRANSIT POINT DESIGNATOR
Explanation: THE DESIGNATOR OF A TRANSIT POINT FOR THE ADVANCE FORCE MOVEMENT.
